name: The Friend Finder
description:
You've decided to change the world using the power of friendship. Or by helping other people to make new friends, anyway.

Help your clients by introducing them to people who you think they will get along with. Or don't, by introducing them to people who you think will be a terrible match.

How will the world change due to the friendships you create?

Details

Made with Twine (SugarCube 2.31.1).

This game is currently In Development. This means that only basic features have been implemented so far in order to test the overall game concept, and gameplay is very likely to change in future updates.

Current Features:

  • All personalities are randomly generated.
  • [Writing In Progress] 135 combinations/outcomes from introducing characters to each other.
  • [Writing In Progress] 5 Standard Endings (True Ending, Perfect Ending, Good Ending, Okay Ending, Bad Ending).

Planned Features:

  • More bonus outcomes from introducing certain personality combinations to each other.
  • Special Endings.
  • Achievements.
